note.head: &repeater;
note.mods: Extended Heavy Mag Sniper Stock 1x HCOG “Classic” 1x Holo 1x-2x Variable Holo 2x HCOG “Bruiser” 3x HCOG "Ranger" 2x-4x Variable AOG Shatter Caps Dual Shell
note.pros: Strong medium-range potential. Low recoil. Decent fire rate. Ability to reload bullets during a fight, one at a time, without emptying the mag. Fairly reliable hipfire at close range, especially with the Shatter Caps Hop-Up. Can open doors by shooting the handle. Efficient with ammo
note.cons: Aiming down sights required for charged shots, which reduces the fire rate. Obstructive iron sights. Rather slow reload speed (less than 3 bullets/second). At close range, easily outclassed by shotguns and SMGs without the Shatter Caps Hop-Up. Low DPS At long range, the slow bullet traveling speed makes it harder to hit enemies. Small mag size without an Extended Heavy Mag.
